Name: Rewind
Description: It's rewind time! Go back to where you were 5 seconds ago instantly.

Name: Ninja Bomb
Description: Turn you and everyone nearby invisible for 8 seconds.

Name: Unbreakable Heart
Description: Become invincible for 3 seconds with the power of determination.

Name: Angelic Presence
Description: Slowly heals and disinfects nearby scientists.

Name: Pride Justice
Description: Absolute unit of speed. +3 walkspeed for 4 seconds

Name: Helping Hand
Description: Weewoo! Save a downed scientist, restoring all their health. Watch out - you will not be cured!

Name: Helping Hand
Description: Weewoo! Save a downed scientist, restoring all their health. Watch out - you will not be cured!

Name: Radiating Power
Description: Make all levers freeze in place for a short duration of time.

Name: Shattered Clock
Description: Break the spacetime continium and halt all the nearby zombies for 5 seconds.

Name: Hot milk
Description: Play with fire and start the round with being 80% infected and 50% of normal health - gives you double income in return!

Name: Sharp Teeth
Description: Deal double damage for a short duration of time.

Name: Escape Plan
Description: If all levers are pulled, instantly teleport to the exit.

Name: Rigged Game
Description: Deactivate a nearby lever to prevent scientists from escaping - why didn't you think of that?

Name: Last Breath
Description: Breathe! Gain more speed for 2 seconds, then become notably slower.

Name: Nightmare
Description: Upon all levers being pulled, deal double damage and become slightly faster.
